title: Trade journalism
text: Trade journalism reports on the movements and developments of the <a href="business">business</a> world by way of articles or analysis. Trade journalism also refers to industry-specific news, such as exclusive focus on <a href="commodities">commodities</a> (e.g. <a href="oil">oil</a>, <a href="Natural%20gas">gas</a> and <a href="metal">metal</a>s) or sectors (<a href="finance">finance</a>, <a href="travel">travel</a>, <a href="food">food</a>). Due to its business nature, trade journalism is often expected to process and interpret a substantial amount of market commentary.
